name: Catacomb
description:
Catacomb is an action, shooter and arcade game developed by Softdisk Publishing and Softdisk. It came out on 01-01-1990. Softdisk published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Catacomb is available on PC and Classic Macintosh.
It was produced by John Romero and Tom Hall. It was directed by John Romero and Tom Hall. Jason Blochowiak scored the game.
